name: Oil-Powered Nation
title: Reliance on Oil for Electricity
description: In 2021, Comoros generated 100% of its electricity from oil, making it one of the few countries entirely dependent on oil for power generation.

name: Minimal Industrial Emissions
title: Negligible F-gases Emissions
description: In 2023, Comoros reported only 0.0001 Mt CO2e emissions from industrial processes, showcasing its minimal industrial impact on greenhouse gas emissions.

name: Struggling Revenue System
title: Low Revenue Mobilization Efficiency
description: With a CPIA rating of 2 in 2023, Comoros faces challenges in efficiently mobilizing revenue, indicating potential fiscal management issues.

name: Trade Challenges Ahead
title: Unfavorable Trade Terms
description: In 2021, Comoros had a net barter terms of trade index of 59.8, suggesting that the country receives less value for its exports compared to imports.
